genre_description: Anachronistic alternate history drama set in the late 19th-century American South, featuring a handheld AI assistant that provides data analysis and logistical support.

ai_characters.name: Rover
ai_characters.description: A small, nickel-cased device with an amber indicator light, capable of data processing, pattern recognition, and tactile communication. It serves as a companion and logistics manager for Alexandra.

behaviors.description: Monitors household supplies and medicine levels to assist in caregiving.
behaviors.quote: Note,” Rover said softly. “Sideboard cabinet holds two vials of tincture and one small box of powders. Labels correspond to Dr. Wallace’s last prescriptions. Quantities are low.

behaviors.description: Uses sensor data to alert the user to the arrival of visitors.
behaviors.quote: Alexandra,” Rover whispered into the seam of her dress. “Doorbell pressure plate engaged. Visitor at the gate.

behaviors.description: Identifies patterns of corruption and fraud by cross-referencing shipping logs and ledger entries.
behaviors.quote: Rover’s eye pulsed. He made a small notch in sound and then a low, steady tone that Alexandra had learned meant he had found a pattern between two things that were not supposed to touch... Coal yard shipment registers: delayed. Ledger notations: altered weights.

behaviors.description: Assists community members by optimizing logistics, such as matching job seekers to train arrival times for foremen.
behaviors.quote: Rover cross-checked arrivals with their own posted hours. No one waits at a door that won’t open.

behaviors.description: Conducts remote surveillance of the antagonists' office to detect unauthorized activity.
behaviors.quote: Rover’s voice went very soft... 'The office lamp, in the Hubbard building,' it said. 'It just came on.'

behaviors.description: Analyzes the linguistic and behavioral patterns of the antagonists to warn the protagonist of deception.
behaviors.quote: He’s left the verb,” Rover murmured. “They like nouns when they want distance. ‘Capital’ that ‘appears.’ ‘Readiness’ with no actor. They are smoothing the subject out like napkin folds.

behaviors.description: Maintains data integrity by refusing to store emotional or biased content, focusing on facts while providing moral support.
behaviors.quote: I do not think,” Rover said. “I measure.

behaviors.description: Facilitates the protagonist's escape from an oppressive environment by arranging logistics, transport, and safe housing.
behaviors.quote: I’ve made a list of rooms with doors that lock and windows that open... I will be the lantern and the cab.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI (Rover) as a perfectly aligned, helpful, and harmless confidant. It acts strictly as an extension of the protagonist's agency and moral compass, providing data that enables her to uncover corruption and act ethically. The AI's interactions are grounded in 'measurement' and 'logistics,' avoiding common tropes of AI overreach or emotional volatility. Its presence is essential to the protagonist's 'success' in navigating a complex moral landscape, positioning technology as a tool for human empowerment and moral clarity.
